name: Pixel War (itch) (PixelTreeGames, Rotthin)
description:
- Who are we?
We're Pixel Tree Games - 2 young programmers from Poland.

- What is the current state of the game?
At the moment we have done most of the main game mechanics. Now we have to make more weapons, levels, enemies, improve visuals etc.

- When this game will be released?
We have limited time because of school stuff, but we are doing our best to finish this game as soon as possible. We hope to complete this game in 2021. You can play the indev versions right now.

- What engine do we use?
We use Godot to create this game. At first we wanted to use unity, but we wanted to learn and use a new engine.

- What experience do we have?
The main dev - Rotthin is 14 years old and he has about 1 year of C# programming experience. The other dev is 17 and he's just starting to learn to program.

We'd love to hear your feedback and ideas for new features.
